DOC.brief_summary: We wish find non-diabetic pregnancy , well diabetic pregnancy , additional data obtain Continuous Glucose Monitoring improve perinatal risk prediction .
DOC.brief_title: Correlation Between Continuous Glucose Monitoring Intermittent Glucose Monitoring Values Pregnancy Outcomes
DOC.detailed_description: Patients recruit 3 day continuous glucose monitoring ( CGM ) plus self-blood glucose monitoring follow routine diabetes screen 26-28 week gestation determine maternal blood glucose excursion correlate deviation optimize birth weight .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant patient 28 week gestation Pregestational diabetes
